Title: Relates to establishing the crime of aggravated forcible touching by an inmate
Summary: Establishes the crime of aggravated forcible touching by an inmate as a class E felony where an inmate forcibly touches the intimate parts of an employee of a correctional facility, the board of parole, the office of mental health, a probation department, bureau or unit, or a police officer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of aggravated forcible touching by an inmate
